summary: PDF utility app rebranded from "PDF Toolkit" to "PDF Vaulty"; user also wants the in-app/app-store displayed app name updated accordingly.

existing_features.title: Update the app’s user-visible name/branding everywhere it appears in the frontend from “PDF Toolkit” to “PDF Vaulty”, including: document/page title, header brand text, logo alt text, and any home-page hero copy that currently says “PDF Toolkit”.
Update i18n translation strings so any English UI copy that currently contains the old app name “PDF Toolkit” is updated to “PDF Vaulty” while preserving existing translation key structure.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change the app name everywhere it appears (in-app title/branding/app listing) to "PDF Vaulty"
